49.eng-name: The Description of the Prophet, may Allah Bless Him and Grant Him Peace
49.ara-name: كتاب صفة النبى صلى الله عليه وسلم

hadiths.text: Yahya related to me from Malik from Zayd ibn Aslam from Amr ibn Sad ibn Muadh from his grandmother that the Messenger of Allah, may Allah bless him and grant him peace, said, "O trusting women, none of you must consider even a roasted sheep's trotter too small to give to her neighbour
